output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can mint arbitrary amounts of tokens, aka 'mintTokenIntegerOverflow' issue.

Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to set the allowance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can increase the allowance of arbitrary users, aka 'transferFromIntegerOverflow' issue.
Predictable buy function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can manipulate the buy price, aka 'buyPredictableRandomness' issue.
Predictable sell function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can manipulate the sell price, aka 'sellPredictableRandomness' issue.
transfer function allows arbitrary transfers, allowing attackers to steal any user's assets, aka 'transferAccessControl' issue.
